I am Niklas and I am 22 years old. In these 22 years I made many interesting experiences and learned a lot about all kinds of different topics. I will now tell you what you should know about my life. 


## Football

The first thing you need to know about me is that I love **football**. My favorite football clubs include *Mainz 05*, *Borussia Dortmund* and *FC Barcelona*. 


## Food

The second thing you should remember about me is that I am very organized. In the following, I prepared a short and ordered list of my favorite cuisines with respective dishes as sub-items: 

1. Italian cuisine

    + Pasta with eggplant sauce
    + Pasta Arrabiata
    + Pizza
  
2. Israeli cuisine 

    + Sabich
    + Shakshuka
  
For your information: Sabich is a pita sandwich which contains grilled eggplants, salad, Hummus and other dips and a boiled egg. It is mouthwateringly delicious and it is the sole reason why I need to go back to Israel for a third time.
